attributes.review: Okay so here’s the deal I told Trump hunny I’m not gonna vote for a pedo I’m just not and do you know what he did he got so angry he THREW my baby into Cheeto dust so he could be “just like him” 😣and after I said no thx he threatened to deport bc I’m Hispanic 😖😔WTHHHH but anyway Michelle Obama for 2020 president 😗✨

attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.title: unbelievable
attributes.review: this app is so horrible. the worst thing i’ve ever downloaded. it’s a disgrace to humanity. it took two weeks to download and when i opened it, it put up a spam add for free condoms. absolutely HORRIBLE. unbelievable.

attributes.title: Horrible app

This made my phone glitch so hard !. And this big orange man kept popping up on my screen . It was scaring me so I just deleted it 0/10 I would not recommend at all literally.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
